# Magic WRX Project Instructions

This is a Next.js business webpage project with the following characteristics:

## Project Structure
- Built with Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript
- Uses Tailwind CSS for styling
- Firebase integration for authentication and backend services
- App Router structure with src/ directory

## Key Features
- Business homepage with hero, features, and CTA sections
- Authentication system (login/signup) with Firebase Auth
- Admin dashboard for user management
- Templates showcase with 5 different business templates
- Pricing page with subscription plans
- Contact page with form
- Mobile-first responsive design
- Modern UI with gradient themes and card shadows

## Business Templates
1. E-commerce Store - Online shopping platform
2. SaaS Platform - Software as a Service application
3. Portfolio Website - Creative professional showcase
4. Restaurant Menu - Digital menu and ordering system
5. Corporate Website - Professional business site

## Firebase Configuration
- Uses Firebase v10 with modular SDK
- Authentication with email/password and Google OAuth
- Firestore database integration
- Analytics and storage services

## Styling Guidelines
- Uses custom CSS classes: .gradient-text, .card-shadow, .hero-gradient
- Primary color scheme: blue (#3b82f6) with purple accents
- Mobile-first responsive design principles
- Modern card-based layouts with rounded corners and shadows

## Development Notes
- All components should be properly typed with TypeScript
- Use 'use client' directive for interactive components
- Follow Next.js App Router conventions
- Implement proper loading states and error handling
- Maintain consistent spacing and typography
